data.title: Norfolk Homes
data.meta_description: Read Norfolk Homes' blog about their new home community in Ann Arbor, Bristol Ridge Townhomes.
data.text:
Experience the Beauty and Charm of Bristol Ridge Townhomes: Selling Fast!

April 6, 2023

With Ann Arbor, Michigan on the rise as the best city to live in throughout the entire country, Norfolk Homes is beyond proud to build our one-of-a-kind communities and high-quality, energy-efficient homes throughout this vibrant city and its surrounding areas. Among these exceptional communities is Bristol Ridge Townhomes, which is now selling fast and waiting for you to call it home.

Bristol Ridge Townhomes stands out as a true gem, mesmerizing long-time residents and first-time visitors alike with its stunning architecture and remarkable amenities. As you step foot into the community, you will be captivated by the modern design, prime location and beautiful, low-maintenance townhomes that cater to all types of lifestyles. Don’t miss out on this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to be part of this phenomenal community—read on to discover why Bristol Ridge Townhomes is the perfect place for you to live your best life in the thriving city of Ann Arbor.

Experience the beauty and charm of Bristol Ridge Townhomes

If you’re looking for a low-maintenance, laid-back lifestyle in a thoughtfully-designed, top-quality home near all of Ann Arbor’s incredible entertainment, career and convenience opportunities—Bristol Ridge Townhomes is the community for you. This extraordinary new home community in the scenic northside of Ann Arbor offers up brand-new townhomes with impeccable design and unbeatable amenities. Residents can enjoy the serene location just off Pontiac Trail with easy access to everything Ann Arbor has to offer—including a short commute to the popular shops and restaurants throughout downtown Ann Arbor, as well as the University of Michigan Campuses and Medical Center. Existing in harmony with nature, Bristol Ridge Townhomes provides the perfect blend of urban living and tranquility, giving you the best of both worlds.

A townhome design that has it all

When you’re not out exploring the city or enjoying the unparalleled outdoor activities, come home to your spacious, stunning townhome—which boasts the remarkable Keswick plan. 3 to 4 bedrooms, 3.5 to 4.5 bathrooms, open living spaces and a 1-car garage come together throughout 3 stories to create a home that is sure to suit all of your needs. Aside from the captivating exterior with the perfect mixture of modern and timeless design, the interior of these townhomes is truly breathtaking. Designed with your convenience and comfort in mind, the efficiently-designed homes offer multiple spaces and rooms to entertain, work from home or relax.

The entry-level features an attached garage, a mudroom with ample closets and a flex room that makes a perfect home office, bedroom or workout room—plus an adjacent full bath. Head up to the main level to find the light-filled living area, which is an open-concept design with the designer kitchen as the central space, accompanied by a cozy adjoining great room and charming dining room. The great room also has a linear fireplace with a luxurious tile surround and a beautiful box beam mantle, leading to a private exterior deck for you to enjoy the Ann Arbor weather without having to leave your home. Going up to the second level, you’ll find the fantastic primary suite—which comes with an oversized walk-in closet and spa-like bathroom. You’ll also find a second bedroom and full bath on this level, as well as a laundry room—providing you with all the space and features you need to live comfortably. Additionally, the townhomes in Bristol Ridge provide a fully-finished basement with flex space that could be used as an additional bedroom or recreation room, and it includes a full bath. From these gorgeous townhomes to the incomparable community atmosphere, Bristol Ridge can provide you with the very best of Ann Arbor living.

Don’t miss out on Bristol Ridge Townhomes

Ann Arbor is a city that has it all, and our team at Norfolk Homes made it our mission to ensure that the same goes for Bristol Ridge. Nestled in a prime location, this community provides an amazing living experience in Ann Arbor, with exceptional amenities and meticulously-crafted homes that offer you the chance to indulge in the absolute best of what this thriving city has to offer. Whether you're a young professional seeking a convenient and vibrant place to live, or a family looking for a beautiful and welcoming community with a functional home design—Bristol Ridge Townhomes is the perfect place to call home.
